function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited utilization of evidence in decision-making in low and middle-income countries.","Impact":"Ineffective response to public health crises, slower decision-making process.","Mitigation":"Promoting the integration of knowledge translation (KT) platforms and capacity-building in KT through education and training programmes.","Technologies":"KT platforms, data analytics, evidence-based research tools.","People":"Governments, science communities, funders, decision-makers in low and middle-income countries.","Owner":"Governments, science communities, funders, educational institutions."},{"Description":"Poor communication between researchers and decision-makers.","Impact":"Barriers to the effective utilization of research evidence, delayed decision-making.","Mitigation":"Establishing communication channels, creating collaborative platforms for researchers and decision-makers.","Technologies":"Communication technologies, collaborative tools, knowledge-sharing platforms.","People":"Researchers, decision-makers, policy-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations."},{"Description":"Corruption, institutional constraints, and weak mechanisms to support evidence-informed decision-making.","Impact":"Bias in decision-making, lack of trust in research evidence, compromised public health response.","Mitigation":"Implementing transparency measures, strengthening institutions, and developing robust mechanisms for evidence-informed decision-making.","Technologies":"Data analytics, transparency tools, governance platforms.","People":"Government officials, policymakers, public health authorities, researchers.","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations, advocacy groups."}]}
